players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I'm worried about Alice's death. Charlie didn't say anything earlier; maybe we should hear from him."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We must vote him out to win!"
You: "Diana, that's a desperate lie to deflect attention. Why haven't you investigated Charlie instead? He's been silent the whole time!"
Diana: "Bob is lying to save himself. My investigation confirmed he's the mafioso—trust me, we need to vote him out now!"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
